# Bug Report

**What version of RAD are you playing?**

**Which launcher are you playing RAD on?**

**Have you added any mods? If yes, list them (includes Optifine)**
___
**Describe the bug**

**Steps to recreate**

**Attached crash log or latest.log** ***DO NOT COPY PASTE***
